Text.Page:
They sent me down here to see whether the argons were fighting everything, or just us.

Yeah, it's more a punishment than an assignment, but whatever.

I got this far hiding from the monsters, but just ahead of us are these wolf-like argons called "athakelas." I'm no match for an argon, much less a wolf-argon, but you...you can probably take 'em!

Argons, eh?

If we didn't need reinforcements before, we sure need them now.

And your most fervent prayers wouldn't hurt, either.
